volunteer_experience.info:
I was privileged to have been one of the 15 students chosen to teach English to 4-5 year old children in Kolkata, India. As part of this experience, we had to raise ‚Ç¨2,500 each in order to pay for medical supplies and other important goods for the poorly children of Kolkata. I take pride in the fact that I paid ‚Ç¨1,000 from my savings in order to cover the cost of my personal flights and then went on to raise another ‚Ç¨4,000 via fundraising which was then directly repatriated to the‚Ä¶
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          I was privileged to have been one of the 15 students chosen to teach English to 4-5 year old children in Kolkata, India. As part of this experience, we had to raise ‚Ç¨2,500 each in order to pay for medical supplies and other important goods for the poorly children of Kolkata. I take pride in the fact that I paid ‚Ç¨1,000 from my savings in order to cover the cost of my personal flights and then went on to raise another ‚Ç¨4,000 via fundraising which was then directly repatriated to the children.
